snippet: CJ McCollum scored 20 points and the Portland Trail Blazers snapped a six-game losing streak with a 102-89 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Wednesday night....
lead_paragraph: CJ McCollum scored 20 points and the Portland Trail Blazers snapped a six-game losing streak with a 102-89 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Blazers Snap 6-Game Losing Streak With 102-89 Win Over Kings
headline.print_headline: Blazers Snap 6-Game Losing Streak With 102-89 Win Over Kings
